p: Hence, the Moscow megacity is a good example of a densely populated urban area, which is affected by pronounced climate changes and by a variability of local climates, and is threatened by vivax malaria outbreaks. This study is based on actual weather observations over the past 40 years. It evaluates the significance of the regional recent climate changes and the heterogeneity of local climates in the Moscow region in terms of climatic favorability for the transmission of vivax malaria.
